mapper.sql: id, user_id, envent_id, amout, source_amount, state, envent_name, create_time, event_user_id, income_type,income_date
mapper.insert: insert into agent_income (id, user_id, envent_id, amout, source_amount, state, envent_name, create_time, event_user_id, income_type) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{enventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{amout,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sourceAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{enventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{eventUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{incomeType,jdbcType=TINYINT})

insert into agent_income
id,
user_id,
envent_id,
amout,
source_amount,
state,
envent_name,
create_time,
event_user_id,
income_type,
income_date,

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
update agent_income
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
envent_id = #{enventId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
amout = #{amout,jdbcType=INTEGER},
source_amount = #{sourceAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
envent_name = #{enventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
event_user_id = #{eventUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
income_type = #{incomeType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
income_date= #{incomeDate,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update agent_income
envent_id = #{enventId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
amout = #{amout,jdbcType=INTEGER},
source_amount = #{sourceAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{afterState,jdbcType=TINYINT},
envent_name = #{enventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
event_user_id = #{eventUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
income_type = #{incomeType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and income_date >= #{incomeDategt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and income_date <= #{incomeDatelt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}

update agent_income set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, envent_id = #{enventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, amout = #{amout,jdbcType=INTEGER}, source_amount = #{sourceAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, envent_name = #{enventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, event_user_id = #{eventUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, income_type = #{incomeType,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select count(1) from ( SELECT count(1) FROM agent_income_detail detail
WHERE detail.user_id in
#{item}
GROUP BY detail.income_date ) h
